text:
The U.S. response to coronavirus:
The biggest success story since the Trump Taj Mahal Casino, the New Jersey Generals, Trump steaks and Trump University.

https://t.co/8sEUDjZv1E

urls.title: Kushner calls US coronavirus response a 'success story' as cases hit 1 million
urls.description: President Donald Trump's senior adviser and son-in-law, Jared Kushner, praised the administration's response to the coronavirus pandemic as a "great success story" on Wednesday -- less than a day after the number of confirmed coronavirus cases in the United States topped 1 million.
